message.content: Now I need to update the JavaScript to use CSS classes instead of inline styles for modal visibility:

function.arguments: {"command": "str_replace", "path": "/workspace/SheepVibes/frontend/script.js", "old_str": "        // Show the modal\n        modal.style.display = 'flex';", "new_str": "        // Show the modal\n        modal.classList.add('is-active');", "security_risk": "LOW"}
function.name: str_replace_editor
